title: stolen account
body: Recently someone had stolen my account and riot support won't respond to my ticket. My old account is REALMVP123. The person who took it changed the email provided for the account and changed the password. Can anyone help please. If i can't recover it, please get that account terminated.

replies.body: write a ticket to the riot games support.

i did twice
Should i write another?
no dont write multiple. you need to be patient sometimes it can take a few workdays. writing multiple might mark you as spammer so they ignore your ticket.
Alright thank you for help. I notify whenever i get help

I looked into your ticket to see what might be taking so long, but I wasn't actually able to see any tickets that you've submitted. It might not have been submitted correctly, so go ahead and shoot us another [**here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Hit me back up when you do and I'll check for you to make sure we got it ^_^!
